name: Dark Seal
simpleDescription: Provides Ability Power and Mana.  Increases in power as you kill enemies.

passives.name: Glory
passives.effects: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. For every stack, gain 4 ability power, up to 40% attack speed at maximum stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to {{ii|Mejai's Soulstealer}}.
